room.name: dark room
room.description: you are in a dark room and there is nothing here except skeletons

room2.name: colorful room
room2.description: you are in a colorful room. WTF just happen?"

room3.name: normal room
room3.description: just a normal room there is nothing to see here

room4.name: twilight room
room4.description: you just enter the twilight zone where everything is messed up and no not the one with sparkily vampires and werewolves

room5.name: game room
room5.description: there are a lot of classic arcade video games here but there is no exit here

room6.name: doll room
room6.description: you are surrounded by creepy looking dolls hopefully they are not chucky

room7.name: empty room
room7.description: there is nothing here really except a big ball
